description: A collection of modules in the D Programming Language that people may find useful.
name: dutils

subPackages.name: sprite
subPackages.description: .spr file format for images because I'm to lazy to use a preexisting one for sprites.

subPackages.name: binom
subPackages.description: Module for doing some bionomial work in the D Programming Language(why did I make this).

subPackages.name: skeleton
subPackages.description: Module for implementing skeletons, e.g. a cube with criss-crossing beams to better detect collision.

subPackages.name: physics
subPackages.description: A very simple and basic physics library.
